entry.title: Answerly — Ongoing SCF Update
entry.content: Answerly — Ongoing SCF UpdateHello Stellar Community,It’s the last day of panel voting of the ongoing Stellar Community Fund (SCF) and I wanted to share some of the milestones that Answerly has achieved so far.The purpose of this post is to highlight the significance of this community fund for achieving our upcoming goals. I (Raza RIzvi) and co-founder (Zain Haider) started working on this project in early 2019. Until now, this project has been fully self-funded and we’ve managed to:Develop answerly.app along with most of its featuresGrown our social media community from 0 to 50K members (twitter+telegram+medium)Over 20K active users on AnswerlyToken listing on 5 centralized exchanges (BKEX, Probit, Hotbit, Dex-trade, and P2PB2B)100% organic volume of Stellar dex.Press release on websites like Yahoo Finance, Investing.com, and 200+ websites more to come.Scaling from 0 to 37 employees.Introduced Answerly NFTs on Litemint. We will continue adding 50 new NFTs every weekStarting a Youtube channel on some of the most searched topics on Youtube. Every video will contain a 15-second introduction to Answerly and Stellar blockchain.At this point, we have a decent marketing and development budget that would last a few months. Our Answerly revenue starts from 1st Quarter 2022 and we need the funds to continue our operations smoothly.Our upcoming steps are:Adding liquidity to the Stellar dex. Stellar dex has proved to be the best exchange for Answerly so far. We plan to integrate SDEX directly to make the withdrawal and trading process convenient for our users.Partnering up with existing Stellar projects like Litemint, Lumenswap, Lobstr wallet, etc.Setting aside a budget for SEO guest posts and influencer marketing.If we don’t make it in this round, we will try again in the next SCF. But I just wanted the Stellar judge panel to know that we’ve been through a lot of struggles in the last 3 years and still managed to achieve these milestones on a very limited budget. If we win this round, we can progress at a faster pace and would be able to achieve things that seem challenging right now. Our interests align with Stellar foundation and we are confident that we can help in growing the utility of Stellar lumens. Just looking for your support and I can promise you the results.Regards,Raza Rizvi

entry.title: Major update about Answerly tokens
entry.content: Hello Stellar Family,So finally it’s time for the **big news** — or should I say 2 big news. I know most of you guys speculated about Answerly tokens being listed on bigger exchanges and you’ll be glad to know that we also have something to share regarding it — but the actual announcement is much bigger than that. We’ll get to the listing info in a bit.Main NewsSo guys, if you’re currently holding any amount of Answerly tokens ($ANSR), you’ll be amazed to know that you’ve just x50 on your investment *literally*.Let us explain!When we first minted Answerly tokens on the Stellar blockchain, we decided to mint 30 million tokens. Over time, we realized that in order to make the circulating supply more sense, we needed to increase the circulating supply by at least 50 times.As you all know, Answerly is a Questions / Answers platform (similar to Quora) that’s built on the Stellar blockchain. If we take an example from the existing Q/A platforms, these have tens of millions of questions.As of 27th Aug 2021, Quora has over 98 million questions. Previously, Yahoo answers (now defunct) also surpassed over 250 million questions. Considering this, it’s safe to understand that 30 million Answerly tokens won’t be enough to sustain the requirements — unless we start halving the “best answer” rewards at a certain point.After carefully analyzing our options, we decided to increase the total supply of Answerly tokens from 30 million to 1.5 billion (x50 increase). We’ve planned this event for 1st September (00:00 EST) after which we’ll lock the supply so that no more tokens are minted.We will take a snapshot of ANSR token holders on (1st Sep 00:00 EST) and anyone who holds any amount of ANSR will be entitled to x50 more tokens.In simple words, if a person holds 1 ANSR, he will receive +49 more tokens. That’s an instant x50 return. Insane, right?Airdrop participantsOnce we’ve distributed the bonuses to the token holders, we’ll start with airdrop distribution the very same day. Token holders who participate in the airdrop before 1st SEP 00:00 EST will be entitled to x10 bonus. The initial airdrop was set to 10 ANSR per participant but now it’s going to be 100 ANSR.Since the airdrop is ongoing until 15th Sep, anyone who participates after 1st Sep will receive the regular 10 ANSR rewards, so make sure you set up a trustline for Answerly token by then.But wait! That’s not it…We’re proud to announce that we’re considering listing Answerly token on the following exchanges:Probit (~$200,000,000 daily volume)Dex-trade (~$200,000,000 daily volume)Vcc Exchange (~$50,000,000 daily volume)Stex (~$25,000,000 daily volume)Mercatox (~$25,000,000 daily volume)The actual listing dates will be announced in the coming few weeks.As you may know, we’ve also participated in the ongoing Stellar Community Fund. Hopefully, if we make it as one of the winners of this round, our next goal is to list Answerly token on Kucoin. For those who don’t know, Kucoin is considered to be one of the biggest and the most reputable exchanges that we have. The total daily volume ranges around $1.5 billion — $2 billion, so that’s a lot of liquidity for Answerly tokens.We understand that some of you guys may have a lot of questions and for this reason, we’ve also decided to conduct an AMA on Reddit on 5th SEP. We’ll answer any queries that you may have.That’s it for now folks. We’re truly thankful for the immense support that you’ve shown Answerly in the past few weeks. Answerly is on its way to becoming one of the biggest Q/A platforms and you’ll be proud to be a part of it.On a final note, don’t forget to snap up Answerly tokens by 1st Sep to receive an insane bonus of x50. Have a nice day!Regards,Raza Rizvi

entry.title: Answerly goals for improving the quality of online information
entry.content: Giant Q/A platforms like Quora are used by millions of people around the world to find relevant and accurate information. However, a large percentage of answers on existing Q/A platforms are not just inaccurate but can even be misleading. Moreover, these platforms are also known for containing plagiarized content from other websites and blogs. Finally, the answers that are not plagiarized are often biased or added by digital marketers to drive targeted traffic to their websites.At Answerly, our biggest aim is to improve the quality of information that users find online. To achieve this goal, we have integrated an algorithm on Answerly that automatically detects the quality of the answers by considering the following factors:UniquenessLengthWords countKeywordsGrammarSentence structureNumber of upvotesAlthough our algorithm is powerful enough to safeguard against any type of spam, if any spammy answer somehow bypasses this algorithm, the users can easily report such posts. We are aimed towards improving the quality of information that you find online and also compensate the users (in $ANSR tokens) for writing answers. Let us know if you have any questions regarding Answerly. Good day!Regards,Raza Rizvi

In order to successfully complete the upcoming tasks, we need funds to hire a total of 8 employees for Social media marketing, Development, Content writing, Designing, etc. This would cost us around $5000 per month. (5000x18 = $90,000).Goal 2: Answerly videos on YT: Total 200 videos (~$125 per video) = $25000.Goal 3: SEO & SMM: $7,500 for guest posting on high-authority websites. This would help us to improve answerly ranking on the search engines. $7,500 for Instagram shoutouts.Goal 4: Additional expenses: Salaries for the core team, hosting costs, plagiarism API cost, buying answerly.com domain name — Everything for $10,000Goal 5: Market making for Answerly token on Sdex $10,000Regards,Raza Rizvi
